website_summaries.verdict: The best budget engine starter fluid option you can buy. Delivers better results than other value brands.
pros: Handles tougher, more stubborn engines than other budget options
Starts engines in even the hottest or coldest weather conditions
Large can lasts a long time, but is still easy to store
cons: Better premium engine starter fluids out there

customer_reviews.title: Oil stain remover
customer_reviews.text: I can't review this product for its intended use, however it works great to remove oil stains. I've been trying to find something to remove oil stains from my concrete driveway and my father-in-law suggested starting fluid. I sprayed some on a few spots in the driveway and when it evaporated the stains were "magically" gone. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Anon ymous

customer_reviews.title: Makes winter starting a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I have a generator with a 10-Hp. hand -start engine. It used to be a major effort to get it going in winter - the old arm can only pull the cord so many times on a cold, unused engine. Take off the air cleaner, open the butterfly valve, give a good shot of this stuff, replace the air cleaner and pull. The engine kicks over the first time. Quickly adjust the choke and throttle and you should be running smoothly even in the coldest weather.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Fuest

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lawn Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Gumout Starting Fluid saves wear and tear on old arms and shoulders. I use it every time to start a "2 pull" Briggs and Stratton that take 8 to 10 pulls in the summer and will not start in the winter. Hauling the mower back to the dealer for service is a royal hassle so a shot of Gumout into the air cleaner and it starts on the first pull. Have used this on 3 different B&S machines and it works on all of them.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: A great diagnose/starting fluid item.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me when trying to diagnose if I had spark or a different issue. Found out I had spark as it would fire but wouldn't keep running. Once I figured out it was the carb, I cleaned the carb and all was great. I haven't had to use this that much, but I keep it on hand just in case something wont start.
customer_reviews.author: Russ R.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product a couple of times before on Amazon and have been very satisfied every time. We have used it starting our car, chain saw, weed whacker, and riding lawn mower. We like that Amazon's prices are bettert than we would get in a brick-and-mortar store here in Montana. And,we live in a remote area - free delivery to our door with Prime makes getting things here very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great product to get old equipment running
customer_reviews.text: I had several old pieces of lawn equipment that weren't starting even after the gas was replaced. A shot of this in the spark plugs and chamber and I was back in business. This product saved me a trip and a minimum charge from any mechanic. I WILL be buying more of this product
customer_reviews.author: BNelson

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pick up. Still didn't start, must not be fuel delivery issue. Found another use I wish I would have thought of a long time ago. Trying to start mower in November to pick up leaves. I used to give up. With this stuff I removed the air cleaner cover, sprayed some of this juice in, shut the choke, started on first pull! Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: gbbrehm

customer_reviews.title: Started the mower right up
customer_reviews.text: My husband did not believe me when I told him that all we needed to start our 3 year old John Deere this spring was a little bit of this stuff right here. Bought the can, made him spray it and start it (in case it blew up) and worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya S

customer_reviews.title: Great degreaser
customer_reviews.text: This works really well on driveway oil stains. The best in my opinion because it doesn’t evaporate nearly as quickly as the other cleaners. I use it as a degreaser in the shop also. Just be careful highly flammable.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement t for one I received with the cap smashed and the spray nozzle broken off from the time I found the damaged product to the time they had another on the way took about ten minutes starting fluid is good to have on hand when you need it
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have several old machines that tend to sit for a while between uses...this usually gets them started up with a few pulls
customer_reviews.author: hondo

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to store!
customer_reviews.text: Used once, put cap on and stored can. Went to use it again and discovered all propellant was gone as well as half the can of fluid. This could have been extremely dangerous if it was near a source of ignition!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL AND GETS THE JOB DONE
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my grandson's minibike when the motor becomes hydro-locked. Take the spark plug out and use this to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Helps on that first start
customer_reviews.text: What else can you say? It's GUMOUT! I bought this for my pull-start generators. Save your arm and shoot this into the intake and varoom!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Harrington, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STUFF !
customer_reviews.text: You could probably spray the wheels and this stuff would find its way to into your carb and start the engine.
customer_reviews.author: Cellohead

customer_reviews.title: Needs one upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff at a great price. It would get five stars if it came with a straw so it could be squirted directly into the carburetor opening.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Gumout 5072866 Starting Fluid, 11 oz.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received this starting fluid and another carb cleaner from Gumout and like the idea of having them around. Carb cleaner works and the starting fluid makes a sad starter fire up more easily.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Toro mower hasn’t ran in 2 years. Started on 2nd pull. Now it starts in 1st pull. Every time.

customer_reviews.text: Had to use half the bottle to get my lawn mower back running from the winter. My friend recommended it to me. Saved me from having to buy a new one.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Okay price. Does what it's supposed to do.

customer_reviews.text: Nearly had a heart attack trying to get my lawn mower started after sitting for about a year...one squirt of this in the carb and it started on the second or third pull.

customer_reviews.title: Works first time every time

customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Very easy to start my mower in the winter. Just make sure you don't flood your engine before you use this. (Words from the experienced wise.)

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding

customer_reviews.text: I've got an old Honda HS80 snowblower that just refuses to start in the winter (fires right up when it's warm out, though). A quick spray of this into the carb and that snowblower comes to life.

product_meta.title: Gumout 5072866 Starting Fluid, 11 oz.
product_meta.description: Gumout Starting Fluid gives fast, smooth starting in all weather conditions. Contains an upper cylinder lubricant to help protect against wear especially at start up. It also contains a corrosion inhibitor to help prolong engine life. Directions: Shake can thoroughly before use. KEEP AWAY FROM BATTERY TERMINALS. Not for diesel fuel. See your vehicle owner’s manual for special instructions for your vehicle. Spray directly into carburetor, air cleaner or air intake for a few seconds, then start engine. Do not flood engine before using. In order to prevent a backfire, do not start engine with air filter off. Do not use while engine is running. Misuse of product can result in personal injury. Use only per label directions.
feature_bullets: For fast, smooth starting in all weather conditions including extreme cold or humid weather

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars787 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
